meanings.definition: Asarums (noun): a genus of plants in the family Aristolochiaceae.
meanings.sent1: The asarums in the garden have unique flowers.
meanings.sent2: I learned about different types of asarums in my botany class.
meanings.sent3: The asarums seemed to be having a party with the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The asarums stood tall like guardians of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the asarums filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Asarums (verb): third person singular present of asarum.
meanings.sent1: She asarums every morning before heading to work.
meanings.sent2: He always asarums when he is feeling happy.
meanings.sent3: The cat asarums playfully around the house.
meanings.sent4: The wind asarums through the trees, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's movements seemed to asarums with grace and precision.

meanings.definition: Asarums (adjective): relating to or characteristic of the genus Asarum.
meanings.sent1: The asarums leaves have a distinct shape.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a peaceful, asarums atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The cat's eyes had an asarums sparkle in them.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had an asarums quality that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the asarums beauty of nature perfectly.
